title: Brian Pern - S01 to S03 - Comedy - Xvid - Slimoo
description:
Brian Pern - Comedy - Xvid - Slimoo
 

=================================================

Brian Pern (Simon Day) is an ageing rock star and former front-man of ground breaking progressive rock group Thotch. 


  
Like many artists of his age, rather than make new music, he spends more time trying to save the planet [b](including his campaign to teach gorillas how to Skype and a benefit gig for car sickness sufferers).[/b]
Wiki:
The series features an impressive range of musicians playing themselves: Peter Gabriel, Roger Taylor, Jools Holland, Rick Wakeman, Rick Parfitt, Chrissie Hynde, Tim Rice, Billy Bragg, Roy Wood, Paul Young, Mark King, Noddy Holder, Martin Kemp, Chas Hodges, and Dave Peacock.

The following actors and television or radio personalities have appeared as themselves in guest roles: Roger Moore, David Arnold, David Baddiel, Noel Edmonds, Miranda Sawyer, John Humphrys, Dan Cruickshank, Mike Read, Jack Whitehall, Martin Freeman, Kathy Burke, Alan Yentob, Paul Gambaccini, Simon McCoy, Annie Nightingale, Dermot O'Leary, Kirsty Young, and Ian Wright.

 
http://www.bbc.co.uk/programmes/b03vh107

=================== What's In This Torrent ===================
 
Brian Pern - S01 - E01 - The Life Of Rock - The Birth Of Rock
Brian Pern - S01 - E02 - The Life Of Rock - Middle Age Of Rock 
Brian Pern - S01 - E03 - The Life Of Rock - Death Of Rock 
 
Brian Pern - S02 - E01 - A Life In Rock - Jukebox Musical 
Brian Pern - S02 - E02 - A Life In Rock - The Day Of The Triffids  
Brian Pern - S02 - E03 - A Life In Rock - Bi-Polar Polar Bear Aid  
 
Brian Pern - S03 - E01 - 45 Years Of Prog And Roll - Festivals And Fans 
Brian Pern - S03 - E02 - 45 Years Of Prog And Roll - Breaking America  
Brian Pern - S03 - E03 - 45 Years Of Prog And Roll - The Thotch Reunion
 
 
   
The problem with Brian Pern is it changes names with each new series

The naming I have used is so they run in order
